nodes.text: Selda was a Togruta male cantina owner on the moon Raada during the first year of the Galactic Empire. His cantina became a frequent meeting place for the resistance against the Imperial occupation. Ahsoka Tano often confided in him during her time on Raada. He lost his left arm, leg, and lekku in the farming accident that killed Kaeden and Miara Larte's parents, with the limbs being replaced by prosthetics.
